bpp/descriptor.name: Squadcube
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: Squadcube is a seller platform that enables multiple sellers to list and sell their products on the ONDC network.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Squadcube is a comprehensive seller platform designed to empower businesses to seamlessly list and sell their products on the ONDC (Open Network for Digital Commerce) network. By connecting sellers with a wide-reaching digital marketplace, Squadcube helps facilitate greater visibility and reach for their products while ensuring a smooth and efficient online selling experience. The platform supports multiple sellers, offering a collaborative space for them to showcase and manage their offerings within the growing ONDC ecosystem.

descriptor.name: Zudio Fashions
descriptor.short_desc: Zudio Fashions is a fashion store offering products through the ONDC platform online.
descriptor.long_desc: Zudio Fashions is a fashion store that offers a wide range of products online through the ONDC platform. Customers can conveniently explore and purchase items from the store through this innovative digital marketplace.

descriptor.name: Classic Cotton Shirt
descriptor.long_desc: A comfortable and stylish cotton shirt, perfect for casual and formal occasions. Made with high-quality fabric for durability and a soft feel. Available in various sizes and colors to suit your style.

descriptor.name: Classic Cotton Shirt
descriptor.long_desc: A comfortable and stylish cotton shirt, perfect for casual and formal occasions. Made with high-quality fabric for durability and a soft feel. Available in various sizes and colors to suit your style.

descriptor.name: Classic Cotton Shirt
descriptor.long_desc: A comfortable and stylish cotton shirt, perfect for casual and formal occasions. Made with high-quality fabric for durability and a soft feel. Available in various sizes and colors to suit your style.

descriptor.name: Comfort Fit Sweatshirt
descriptor.long_desc: A cozy and stylish sweatshirt designed for everyday comfort. Made from soft, breathable fabric, perfect for casual wear or lounging. Available in multiple colors and sizes to match your style.

descriptor.name: Classic Crew Neck T-Shirt
descriptor.long_desc: A versatile and comfortable T-shirt made from soft, breathable fabric. Perfect for casual outings or layering.

descriptor.name: Men Casual Jacket
descriptor.long_desc: A sleek and stylish jacket designed for men, offering both warmth and comfort. Made with durable fabric, this jacket is perfect for casual outings or layering during colder weather

descriptor.name: Cozy Knit Sweater
descriptor.long_desc: This soft and comfortable sweater is perfect for staying warm on cooler days. Made from breathable fabric, it has a relaxed fit and ribbed cuffs and hem for added detail. Easy to pair with jeans or leggings, it’s a versatile piece for any wardrobe.

descriptor.name: Stoles for Men
descriptor.long_desc: Add a touch of elegance and warmth to your outfit with our men’s stole. Made from soft, lightweight fabric, it’s perfect for layering over a shirt or jacket. Ideal for both casual and formal occasions, this stole provides extra warmth without compromising on style.

descriptor.name: Men Track Shirts
descriptor.long_desc: Stay comfortable and active with our men’s track shirt. Made from breathable, moisture-wicking fabric, it keeps you cool and dry during workouts or outdoor activities. With a sleek, sporty design, it’s perfect for both exercise and casual wear.

descriptor.name: Track Pants
descriptor.long_desc: Our men’s track pants are designed for comfort and performance. Made from lightweight, stretchable fabric, they offer a flexible fit for workouts, runs, or casual outings. With an elastic waistband and side pockets, these track pants combine practicality and style.

descriptor.name: Men Classic Jeans
descriptor.long_desc: These men’s jeans combine style and comfort for everyday wear. Made from durable denim, they offer a great fit with a classic design. Perfect for pairing with any top, these jeans are a versatile addition to your wardrobe.

descriptor.name: Women Casual Shorts
descriptor.long_desc: Stay comfortable and stylish with our women’s casual shorts. Made from soft, breathable fabric, they’re perfect for warm weather. With a relaxed fit and a variety of colors, these shorts are easy to pair with any top for a laid-back, fashionable look.

descriptor.name: Stretchable Formal Pants
descriptor.long_desc: Our range of formal trousers are designed keeping you in mind. With fits and styling that will make you stand apart and prices that will give you great value for your money, symbol formal trousers are simply impossible to say no to.
